duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical support for payroll systems including Apple Employee Systems, Kronos, ADP Global View Payroll, and relevant interfaces.
Hands-on experience with SAP HR Payroll modules and Workday process and integration with payroll system knowledge.
Support Global Payroll systems for technical defects, enhancements, or regular maintenance for Payroll Operations/Processing teams on system issues.
Create and update system issues tickets as needed, hold regular calls with IS&T, ADP, and business partners to communicate & monitor issue closure.
Maintain and monitor Merlin/Kronos/TAP Tables per functional needs such as new work schedules, new Jobs, new pay schedules, new Leaves, new Wage Types, etc.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
